column4: Theres another dude here in the way. Only one way to get rid of him.
AHHHH! Oh. These are just dolls. I thought they were corpses.
Gamemasterrrrrrr. I want to go up a level!
Daaaaaamnn! You look good! Pretty people survive longer.
Error: The person who wrote this code is an idiot. Gain a level as compensation.
Are the rules too vague? Ugh fine. You can go up a level you weakling.
Gimme that gold! I mean, if you trade me 1000 gold pieces, I can give you a level.
Hey, gamemaster here. I do love a free meal.
Secret Boss: The Ant Queen. Kill it and i'll- oh. You already did...heres a level.
A red bandana of bad-assery. Capable of granting you bad-ass ass-kicking bad-ass bad guys. +3 to your AP.
Its just a black scarf. Oh wait please don't walk away! It-uh-it makes you invisible! Yes..totally! +4 to your AP.
Ayyyyyyy lets hit the club! Or...own the club. And hit others with it! +3 to your AP.
A top hat that grants you the courage of Burppyndor!! +1 to your AP.
AY! Get your mind out the gutter. Its just a helmet with giant horns. You creep. +1 to your AP.
Standard leather armor. +1 to your AP.
A knights armor made of Mythrias Mithril, the strongest material in the universe. +3 to your AP.
This wizard hat is super duper reeeelly sharp and pointy. +3 to your AP.
Yeah. Maybe a title will do you some good. Like ___ THE HEAVENLY BODY. Or ___ THE US PRESIDENT. +3 to your AP.
A chestpiece made for smaller creatures. Of course you could try and put it on, just might hurt. +3 to your AP.
Whos idea was it to mae armor out of a Drooling Slime? +1 to your AP.
Gain some vertical prowess and intimidate your foes with this stepladder. +3 to your AP.
A humongous blade, sharp enough to cut through anything. Can you bear the weight? +3 to your AP.
A swashing buckler blade made to swash the bucklers that swish and swash. +2 to your AP.
Peacefully grind your foes down with this tiny cheese grater. +3 to your AP.
Do you dare weild this blade? Though forged with intent to betray to those loved? +3 to your AP.
A hammer that has seen its fair share of war. And capped knees. +4 to your AP.
A pepper sprayer that contains the sharpest pepper in the universe. +4 to your AP.
En Garde! This rapier should be used for the unfairest of duels. +3 to your AP.
Well...its a rat...on a stick. We do the best with what we have. +1 to your AP.
A shield that spans the universe. Literally. It can be anywhere at once. +4 to your AP.
A sword made by my ex. That sneaky bastard. +2 to your AP.
A magic staff capable of igniting anything in its path. +5 to your AP.
A majestic bow decorated with ribbons and bows (the other kind). +4 to your AP.
AN INSTRUMENT OF DEATH AND DESPAIR! YOUR FOES WILL BURST WITH BLOODIED CRIES OF PAIN! +3 to your AP.
A tall metal pole so heavy you can hardly lift it. So, maybe not the best weapon. +1 to your AP.
Might as well be Sisyphus with this rock. +3 to your AP.
A polearm capable of transforming into any bladed weapon with a simple spin. +4 to your AP.
You ready to kick some butt? These boot have been enhanced with anti-butt magic. +2 to your AP.
Slide, drift, and dash around your foes with these boots. +1 to your AP.
Probably the only time pantyhose will be useful. +3 to your AP.
Theyre sandals. They protect your feet from the floor. Thats it. +1 to your AP.
Sharp knees are good for...something? +1 to your AP.
A dotion poncocted to donfuse and cisorient. +3 to your AP. Usable once only.
Boiling hot lava + snake poison works? Thats the recipe. +3 to your AP. Usable once only.
An banned drink from the olympics due to its elusive abilities. +2 to your AP. Usable once only.
A potion made to fix bad breath but inadvertently worsens it. +2 to your AP, or instatnly kills the Floating Nose. Usable once only.
Smells like alcohol. Taste like alcohol. +2 to your AP. Usable once only.
A potion with the power of a million bats knocking you out. +2 to your AP. Usable once only.
Yup. Yeah yup. Uh-huh. Yup. +2 to your AP. Usable once only.
Summons a mirage image of you to fight along side you. +10 to your AP. Usable once only.
Drink this and you might just gain some radioactive superpowers. +5 to your AP. Usable once only.
Elders glue: a formula of the ancient ones for building the heavenly towers. +2 to your AP. Usable once only.
Throwing this potion creates a chilling zone that freezes anything in it. +3 to your AP. Usable once only.
OMG BFFs!!! Best Friends For-the-time-being! Now quick! Attack! +2 to your AP. Usable once only.
Hold a Thanksgrieving party. Monsters are invited to celebrate their DEATH! +10 to your AP. Usable once only.
Cast an unblockable flame wall that burns all in its path or near it. +3 to your AP. Usable once only.
Turn invisible to stab your opponent in the back. +2 to your AP. Usable once only.
Rub the lamp real hard and summon a genie that aids you in combat. +10 to your AP. Usable once only.
A literal missile that leaves a trail of sparkles. +5 to your AP. Usable once only.
Named after some girl named Polly who turned into a parrot. +3 to your AP. Usable once only.
Deathly pretty balloons, capable of annihilating creatures who touch it. +5 to your AP. Usable once only.
